languages.text: "Зачем ты мне это говоришь? Согласно правилам, ты должна притворяться дворянкой. Тогда тебе пожалуют награду".
"Why are you telling me this? According to the rules, you are meant to pose as a noble, then you get a reward."
languages.original_text: "Зачем ты мне это говоришь? Согласно правилам, ты должна притворяться дворянкой. Тогда тебе пожалуют награду".

traits.locale_text: "Why are you telling me this? According to the rules, you are meant to pose as a noble, then you get a reward."
"Why are you telling me this? According to the rules, you are meant to pose as a noble, then you get a reward."
"Why are you telling me this? According to the rules, you are meant to pose as a noble, then you get a reward."
"Why are you telling me this? According to the rules, you are meant to pose as a noble, then you get a reward."
"Why are you telling me this? According to the rules, you are meant to pose as a noble, then you get a reward."
"Why are you telling me this? According to the rules, you are meant to pose as a noble, then you get a reward."

languages.text: “你为什么要和我说这些？根据这里的规矩，你应该伪装成贵族，之后就能得到奖励。”
languages.original_text: "Why are you telling me this? According to the rules, you are meant to pose as a noble, then you get a reward."

traits.locale_text: “你为什么要和我说这些？根据这里的规矩，你应该伪装成贵族，之后就能得到奖励。”

languages.text: 「なぜそれを{mf|俺|私}に言うんだ？ルールでは、君は貴族のふりをして、それで報酬を受け取ることになっているはずだろう」
languages.original_text: "Why are you telling me this? According to the rules, you are meant to pose as a noble, then you get a reward."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜそれを{mf|俺|私}に言うんだ？ルールでは、君は貴族のふりをして、それで報酬を受け取ることになっているはずだろう」

languages.text: «¿Por qué me cuentas esto? Las reglas dictan que finjas ser noble y luego recibirás una merecida recompensa».
languages.original_text: "Why are you telling me this? According to the rules, you are meant to pose as a noble, then you get a reward."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué me cuentas esto? Las reglas dictan que finjas ser noble y luego recibirás una merecida recompensa».

languages.text: "İyi de neden bana bunu anlatıyorsun ki? Kurallar belli: Soylu gibi davranan ödüllendirilir."
languages.original_text: "Why are you telling me this? According to the rules, you are meant to pose as a noble, then you get a reward."

traits.locale_text: "İyi de neden bana bunu anlatıyorsun ki? Kurallar belli: Soylu gibi davranan ödüllendirilir."

languages.text: « Pourquoi me racontez-vous tout cela ? Selon les règles, vous êtes censée vous faire passer pour une noble afin de recevoir une récompense. »
languages.original_text: "Why are you telling me this? According to the rules, you are meant to pose as a noble, then you get a reward."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi me racontez-vous tout cela ? Selon les règles, vous êtes censée vous faire passer pour une noble afin de recevoir une récompense. »

languages.text: "Warum erzählt Ihr mir das? Den Regeln zufolge sollt Ihr als Adelige auftreten und erhaltet dafür eine Belohnung."
languages.original_text: "Why are you telling me this? According to the rules, you are meant to pose as a noble, then you get a reward."

traits.locale_text: "Warum erzählt Ihr mir das? Den Regeln zufolge sollt Ihr als Adelige auftreten und erhaltet dafür eine Belohnung."
